title: I shudder to announce this
author: VD
content_html: But the Gypsy Queen has presented the White Buffalo with an heir. Any strange omens or ominous portents you have noticed in the last week or so may be safely attributed to this landmark event.
content_text: But the Gypsy Queen has presented the White Buffalo with an heir.  Any strange omens or ominous portents you have noticed in the last week or so may be safely attributed to this landmark event.
